languages.text: Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer's Hot on the Trail {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains + 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者触发{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}紧随其后{/g}能力的{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，装备者在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，以及等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者触发紧随其后能力的{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，装备者在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，以及等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: 使用者の{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}猛追{/g}によって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}が発生すると、使用者はこの追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}+1と+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}分の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 猛追によって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加のターン{/g}が発生するたびに、着用者はこの追加の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で1の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cuando se activa el {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} de {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g} del portador, el portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se activa el {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} de Seguir el rastro del portador, el portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} des Trägers ausgelöst wird, erhält er für diesen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wan immer der {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} Heiß auf der Spur des Trägers ausgelöst wird, erlangt er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}- und +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} für diesen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

languages.text: В {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, полученный в результате действия способности {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g}, персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, полученный в результате действия способности Взять след, персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

В {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, полученный в результате действия способности Взять след, персонаж получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} conféré par la capacité {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la piste{/g} de l'utilisateur est déclenché, celui-ci bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} conféré par la capacité Sur la Piste de l'utilisateur est déclenché, celui-ci bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et de +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire.
